items.content_html: A lightweight web platform for managing student records using JSONPowerDB's NoSQL database. Features real-time CRUD operations with automatic offline fallback to mock data.
items.title: ShanpreetSingh/StudentDatabase: A lightweight web platform for managing student records using JSONPowerDB's NoSQL database. Features real-time CRUD operations with automatic offline fallback to mock data.

items.content_html: A lightweight web-based simulator for controlling a UAV using Python code. This app features a real-time 3D drone visualization, motor thrust plots, and a built-in code editor, allowing users to test flight logic directly in the browser. Ideal for testing drone dynamics, control systems, and autonomous flight.
items.title: Rakshan-VP/Quadcopter-sim: A lightweight web-based simulator for controlling a UAV using Python code. This app features a real-time 3D drone visualization, motor thrust plots, and a built-in code editor, allowing users to test flight logic directly in the browser. Ideal for testing drone dynamics, control systems, and autonomous flight.

items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.
items.title: thinakaranmanokaran/Package-Helper: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.

items.content_html: NodeExpressDate is a lightweight Node.js application built with Express and body-parser that processes HTTP requests based on dynamic Date and time conditions. It demonstrates conditional routing using JavaScript’s Date object and if/else logic, making it a practical example for learning date-based API responses in a Node.js environment.
items.title: vdharmendra/NodeExpressDate-Template: NodeExpressDate is a lightweight Node.js application built with Express and body-parser that processes HTTP requests based on dynamic Date and time conditions. It demonstrates conditional routing using JavaScript’s Date object and if/else logic, making it a practical example for learning date-based API responses in a Node.js environment.

items.content_html: Lightweight full-featured typescript/javascript WhatsApp Web API
items.title: WhiskeySockets/Baileys: Lightweight full-featured typescript/javascript WhatsApp Web API

items.content_html: A lightweight web inventory app that lets you scan or enter barcodes, snap product photos via your device camera (converted to data-URLs), and store & retrieve items in Airtable.
items.title: Sandruttee/inventory-app: A lightweight web inventory app that lets you scan or enter barcodes, snap product photos via your device camera (converted to data-URLs), and store & retrieve items in Airtable.

items.content_html: A lightweight, robust PDF parsing library for Node.js written in TypeScript. Extract text, images, and metadata from PDFs with no external dependencies.
items.title: martinhollstrand/pdfnano: A lightweight, robust PDF parsing library for Node.js written in TypeScript. Extract text, images, and metadata from PDFs with no external dependencies.

items.content_html: Keeper App is a simple React-based note-taking app that lets you create, view, and delete notes. It saves data locally in your browser using localStorage, so your notes persist without needing a backend. This lightweight app is great for learning React fundamentals and managing client-side data.
items.title: Amritasri10/Keeper-App: Keeper App is a simple React-based note-taking app that lets you create, view, and delete notes. It saves data locally in your browser using localStorage, so your notes persist without needing a backend. This lightweight app is great for learning React fundamentals and managing client-side data.

items.content_html: A flexible and lightweight SDK for building Stripe integrations with dynamic endpoints, caching, and response transformations.
items.title: nuecms/stripe-sdk: A flexible and lightweight SDK for building Stripe integrations with dynamic endpoints, caching, and response transformations.

items.content_html: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.
items.title: react18-tools/nextjs-darkmode: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.

items.content_html: oauth-fetch is a lightweight, flexible HTTP client built on top of the native fetch API to simplify making requests to both public and OAuth-protected resources.
items.title: jacobovidal/oauth-fetch: oauth-fetch is a lightweight, flexible HTTP client built on top of the native fetch API to simplify making requests to both public and OAuth-protected resources.

items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: Part 1 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). This is the front end component to the application utilizing react and typescript to build a scalable lightweight discord clone, for people who want to meet and make friends with others of like minded interests
